channel.title: Joe's Blog
channel.description: Welcome to the real world, it sucks, but you gonna love it!

item.title: Poem
item.author: Joe
item.description: Poem 青青河畔草，郁郁园中柳。 盈盈楼上女，皎皎当窗牖。 娥娥红粉妆，纤纤出素手。 昔为倡家女，今为荡子妇。 游子行不归，空床难独守。

item.title: Hello
item.author: Joe
item.description: Title Welcom to the real world, it sucks, but you gonna love it!
